name: CyberFire
description:
An android awakens in a junkyard with his memory wiped clean. How did he get there? What's next for Andy?

This game was made for UCF's Introduction to Game Design course. I am one of 6 designers that worked on the project. We were given a month to create a game, and this is what we made.

This game is a prototype, that may or may not be revisited later.
